name: Office Escape (itch) (TenaciousDanny, baltis)
description:
Controls
  • WASD or arrow keys to move
  • E to enter bathrooms and closets
Story

ACCESS DENIED.

“What the hell? Is this card reader broken or something? But this is the third elevator I’ve tried!”

ACCESS DENIED.

“Work, dammit! I wanna go home!”

ACCESS DENIED. YOUR EMPLOYEE ID HAS BEEN TEMPORARILY SUSPENDED AFTER MULTIPLE UNSUCCESSFUL ATTEMPTS. PLEASE TRY AGAIN IN 24 HOURS.

“Why you metal piece of- wait, what’s that sound?”

sounds of machinery

“Those creepy robots are everywhere… don’t tell me they’re here to keep us from leaving…”

“No, there’s gotta be a way out of here. There’s no way I’m staying overnight in the office again!”

“That’s it, there’s a fire exit on this floor! I can see it just across the hall!”

sounds of machinery getting louder

“I just have to sneak past those killer robots, right?”

“Ugh... Why didn’t we implement a self-destruct function on these things?”

Credits
  • Artist - Baltis
  • Programmer - TenaciousDanny
  • Special thanks to BGM for the music
